item.title: I got a VPS!
item.dc:creator: @h4x0r88 h4x0r88
item.description:
@h4x0r88 wrote:

Telenim:

awesome job

[quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=396609.msg2945418#msg2945418 date=1252189057]
Not that i am aware, i don’t really understand the funtions of a VPS. concidering i only learnt what a VPS was about a week ago.
[/quote]It’s like a computer that you can access from your computer (or other computers)
You can use it for hosting servers.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2009, 04:27:51 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Si Force link=topic=396609.msg2945435#msg2945435 date=1252189481]

Why did you purchase a VPS and not have a purpose to use it for?
[/quote]I never said i didn’t?

Then why are you asking us what you should do with it, what do you expect it can do?
[/quote]i was asking if i could something cool with it lol (other than hosting my private server)

You can host forums on it.[/quote]Good idea.

Read full topic
